enchantment.musuen.laceration.desc: Increases the damage of the weapon but at the cost of the user's life.
enchantment.musuen.skewering.desc: Increases the damage of the trident but at the cost of the user's life.
enchantment.musuen.unearthing.desc: Makes a tool dig in tunnels but at the cost of the user's life.
enchantment.musuen.phasing.desc: Makes the user teleport over a wall but at the cost of the user's life
enchantment.musuen.overcharged.desc: Overcharges tools for increased damage but at the cost of the user's life.
enchantment.musuen.berserker.desc: Increases the damage of the weapon while the user does not stop the attacks.
enchantment.musuen.reaching.desc: Increases the reaching distance of the user while using a tool.
enchantment.musuen.pocketed.desc: Adds pockets to the leggings to increase the user inventory size.
enchantment.musuen.vein_miner.desc: Allows a tool to break entire veins of the same type of block.
enchantment.musuen.attraction.desc: Attracts nearby items on the ground toward the user position.
enchantment.musuen.meteority.desc: Increases the elytra velocity applied to the player when using a firework.
enchantment.musuen.wingspan.desc: Inflicts knockback to the entities surrounding the user after landing with the elytra.
enchantment.musuen.alighting.desc: Decreases the fall damage while the elytra are equipped. Does not protect against kinetic energy damage.
enchantment.musuen.telekinesis.desc: Teleports the drops from the killed entities to the player position.
enchantment.musuen.sky_jump.desc: Allows the user to perform multiple jumps while in mid-air.
enchantment.musuen.long_jump.desc: Allows the user to perform longer jumps. Only works when the user is sprinting.
enchantment.musuen.demonction.desc: Protects the user against damage generated by demonic enchantments.
enchantment.musuen.skyhook.desc: Allows the crossbow to launch the user forward by tying him to an arrow. Only works if the user has a lead in the inventory.
enchantment.musuen.reflection.desc: Makes the shield reflect more the projectiles shot towards the user.
enchantment.musuen.shockwave.desc: Makes the shield create a shockwave on the ground for damaging and pushing away entities.
enchantment.musuen.coverage.desc: Increases the shield ability to protect the user by expanding the protection angle.
enchantment.musuen.everlasting.desc: Makes the enchanted item never despawn.
enchantment.musuen.zero_gravity.desc: Makes the shot projectiles have no gravity an fly into a straight line.
enchantment.musuen.dreamlike.desc: Decreases the probability of Phantoms spawning because of insomnia.
death.attack.demonicEnchanting: %1$s made a bad deal with a demon
death.attack.demonicEnchanting.player: %1$s made a bad deal with a demon
